jmetal.base.operator.mutation
Class PolynomialMutation

java.lang.Object
  jmetal.base.Operator
      jmetal.base.operator.mutation.Mutation
          jmetal.base.operator.mutation.PolynomialMutation
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class PolynomialMutation
extends Mutation

This class implements a polynomial mutation operator. NOTE: the operator is applied to Real solutions, so the type of the solutions must be SolutionType_.Real. NOTE: if you use the default constructor, the value of the etc_m parameter is ETA_M_DEFAULT_. You can change it using the parameter "distributionIndex" before invoking the execute() method -- see lines 116-119

See Also:
